name: Verify tag value -- @1.1

steps.name: When we execute the GET API request based on tag value :: technology,famous-quotes
Then the response should contain technology,famous-quotes sent in the request.

fullName: Verify if tag value is correct as per the query parameter in the API GET request.: Verify tag value
